subject: Football
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: Darren Sharper, who won a Super Bowl with the New Orleans Saints, is scheduled to be in a courtroom Friday in California, one of five states where he is facing accusations of sexual assault.
snippet: Darren Sharper, who won a Super Bowl with the New Orleans Saints, is scheduled to be in a courtroom Friday in California, one of five states where he is facing accusations of sexual assault.
